text: New York, I Love You is a 2008 American romantic-comedy-drama movie directed by Fatih Akin, Yvan Attal, Randall Balsmeyer, Allen Hughes, Shunji Iwai, Jiang Wen, Shekhar Kapur, Joshua Marston, Mira Nair, Natalie Portman, and Brett Ratner. ==Cast== It stars Bradley Cooper, Shia LaBeouf, Natalie Portman, Anton Yelchin, Hayden Christensen, Orlando Bloom, Irrfan Khan, Rachel Bilson, Chris Cooper, Andy Garc√≠a, Christina Ricci, John Hurt, Cloris Leachman, Robin Wright Penn, Julie Christie, Maggie Q, Ethan Hawke, James Caan, Shu Qi, and Eli Wallach. ==Release== The movie premiered at the 2008 Toronto International Film Festival in September 2008. It was released in the United States on October 16, 2009. ==Other websites== * * * * * * * "Cities of Love Franchise website" == References == Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:2008 comedy-drama movies Category:2008 romantic comedy movies Category:2008 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Cantonese-language movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:French drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French- language movies Category:Movies directed by Mira Nair Category:Movies directed by Joshua Marston Category:Movies directed by Brett Ratner Category:Movies directed by Fatih Akin
title: New York, I Love You
